feed.title: Oxpecker Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Moshidon: 2.3.0+fork.106.moshinda
entry.content:
New things:

  • Import export settings (for logged accounts only)
  • Render post URLs as if they were actual quote posts
  • See filter highlights
  • Warn if UnifiedPush is disabled on fdroid
  • Put the download/share buttons on the image viewer in their previous place
  • See timelines to trending links (server must support it)
  • Add option to strip url's tracking parameters
  • You can now pick an account when launching compose from a launcher menu
  • Many minor bugfixes and improvements

entry.title: New release for Moshidon: 2.3.0+fork.107.moshinda
entry.content:
New things:

  • Fixed Pixelfed login
  • Fixed numerous crashes

From 106: * Import export settings (for logged accounts only) * Render post URLs as if they were actual quote posts * See filter highlights * Warn if UnifiedPush is disabled on fdroid * Put the download/share buttons on the image viewer in their previous place * See timelines to trending links (server must support it) * Add option to strip url's tracking parameters * You can now pick an account when launching compose from a launcher menu * Many minor bugfixes and improvements

entry.title: New release for Moshidon: 2.3.0+fork.108.moshinda
entry.content:
• Fixed a bunch of crashes
  • Small bug fixes and improvements

entry.title: New release for Moshidon: 2.3.0+fork.109.moshinda
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Added toggle for enhanced text size
  • [#346] Fix Akkoma translations. by @blacklight in https://github.com/LucasGGamerM/moshidon/pull/606
  • Add reply_to_user string by @TRMSC in https://github.com/LucasGGamerM/moshidon/pull/608
  • Unifiedpush/push settings by @p1gp1g in https://github.com/LucasGGamerM/moshidon/pull/589
  • Standard push + UnifiedPush update by @p1gp1g in https://github.com/LucasGGamerM/moshidon/pull/588
  • feat(Compose): exclude own account from reblog mentions by @FineFindus in https://github.com/LucasGGamerM/moshidon/pull/549
  • Feat/block domain by @FineFindus in https://github.com/LucasGGamerM/moshidon/pull/521
  • feat(Timeline/Hashtag): show confirmation sheet when muting by @FineFindus in https://github.com/LucasGGamerM/moshidon/pull/520
  • Iceshrimp improvements by @Jacocococo in https://github.com/LucasGGamerM/moshidon/pull/516
  • A bunch of small fixes and improvements

New Contributors

  • @blacklight made their first contribution in https://github.com/LucasGGamerM/moshidon/pull/606
  • @TRMSC made their first contribution in https://github.com/LucasGGamerM/moshidon/pull/608
  • @p1gp1g made their first contribution in https://github.com/LucasGGamerM/moshidon/pull/589
  • @Jacocococo made their first contribution in https://github.com/LucasGGamerM/moshidon/pull/516

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LucasGGamerM/moshidon/compare/2.3.0+fork.108.moshinda...2.3.0+fork.109.moshinda

entry.title: New release for Moshidon: 2.3.0+fork.110.moshinda
entry.content:
• Fix timeline loading on some more up to date mastodon servers
